ygData.subject: Alternative FD 'nerf' being discussed on www.eqnecro.com
ygData.msgSnippet: An alternative idea to the current Feign Death nerf is being discussed on the message board of http://www.eqnecro.com
ygData.messageBody:
An alternative idea to the current Feign Death 'nerf' is being discussed on
the message board of http://www.eqnecro.com
(http://www.eqnecro.com/noncgi/Forum1/HTML/001723.html).

Simply put, the idea (as described by Chiggy), would be when the 15 minute
time limit was hit, the pet (if present) would commit suicide.

To me, this seems MUCH more reasonable then making us stand up, risking death,
especially if your group hasn't re-broken their way back in to where you are
feigning.

Anyway, I'm sure the necro comunity at large would benefit from the input of
this list, with perhaps even better ideas, or support of this one.


Drakkyl of Povar
Necromancer of the 8th Circle

PS. I am interested in buying Words of Dissemination, Parasitism,
Incorporeal, or Purification. Or, Vampiric Curse and Renew Bones.
I have (1) Intensify Death for any interested lvl 24ish necros as well.
